text: About South Alps Cold Storage And Logistics Inc.

At South Alps, we stand as a fully integrated cold storage warehouse provider, offering a comprehensive cold chain solution that encompasses reefer plug-ins, loading and unloading, blast freezing, boxing and labeling, and chiller and freezer storage facilities. Above all, our commitment to seamless Inventory Management allows our valued customers to concentrate on their core business operations.

Our pride and honor stem from our state-of-the-art facility, where we consistently deliver unparalleled efficiency and safety. We take immense pride in maintaining one of the most hygienic and condensation-free warehouses in the Philippines, a reputation we have upheld for over four years of dedicated service.

Our facility has garnered prestigious AA ratings from NMIS, BFAR, and BPI, attesting to our unwavering commitment to quality and safety. We are certified in compliance with GOP and soon HACCP, reflecting our dedication to upholding industry-leading standards.

Moreover, in the year 2021, South Alps embarked on a new path by venturing into build-to-suit factory and dry warehouse projects. This strategic move has expanded our offering to include an extensive gross leasable space of over 10,000sqm, enabling us to provide customized industrial spaces tailored to our clientsâ€™ ever-evolving needs.

South Alps Cold Storage and Logistics Inc. operates a modern and efficiently designed cold storage facility that is strategically located at Southwoods Industrial Park, Brgy. Mabuhay, Carmona, Cavite (3kms away from Carmona Exit) - a perfect converging point of distribution and service to the Metro Manila and Southern Luzon segments.
The company caters blast freezing, cold storage warehousing, temperature controlled transportation, inventory management, and other value added services.

16 Cold Storage Rooms with combined capacity of 7,680 pallet positions
